texts.en: Joseph is a 39 year old gentleman married with 7 children and deals in a first hand clothes business which he has run for a period of 6 years. He started with agriculture then local brew finally to cloth business.He says inadequate capital and high taxes are affecting the business.Joseph would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets.Joseph wants a loan to buy clothes  for sell during the Easter season.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sell during the Easter season.

loans.name: Khadra

texts.en:
Khadra is a 50 years old conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the photo. 
Her husband Mohammad bought some heavy equipment after his retirement such as compressors, and started a rental business along with freelancing.
Now that some of the equipment he has need maintenance, Khadra has applied to this loan to help her husband repair the equipments and buy other as an expansion to his business.

loans.use: To help her husband does some maintenance on the machines he has.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en: Claudio is a 38 year old gentle man married with 4 children and deals in a retail business which he has run for a period of 1 year. He started with agriculture then boda boda and produce finally got capital and started a retail business. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business. Claudio would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets and buy land for growing crops.He wants a loan to buy sugar, salt and baking powder for sale.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and baking powder for sale.

loans.name: Saroeun's Group

texts.en: Saroeun is 20 years old and married with one girl. She leads a group of three members, all of whom are female. She lives in cottage with bamboo wall in a rural area of Kompong Cham province. She has been farming for around six years. Saroeun requested the first loan from VisionFund to farm her rice field and hopes to produce good quality of rice so that she can sell it in good price. She plans to use the money from selling the rice to have a proper house and set aside some saving for sending her daughter to school.

loans.use: To farm rice paddy

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 26 year old lady dealing in Stationary business.She has operated it for 2 years and she started with capital got from her father.She faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time.Juliet would like mostly to build a permanent home.She would like to move her business to more permanent location.Juliet wants a loan to buy books,pens and rims of paper for sale.

loans.use: to buy books, pens and rims of paper for sale.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is   38   years old   married    to Roseline.He operates a small  pharmacy and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is his first term loan with KADET ltd of Kes 30,000.He was introduced to Kadet by a Kadet client. He plans to use the loan amount to purchase more medicine stock for his business.

He hopes to open another pharmacy, which will in turn help him increase his income.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: Ibtesam

texts.en:
Ibtesam is a 48 -year-old married woman and a mother of three sons and three daughters. Her husband is employed who earns a low salary, but not enough to cover the family's needs. 
Ibtesam wants to share her husband in improving the family's income by raising sheep and selling its products, which will be a profitable project.

Ibtesam is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing number of sheep to raise and improving the herd's condition. This will enable Ibtesam to start her project and sell sheep products to customers which will lead to improve the family's income.
Ibtesam is photographed next to the herd.

loans.use: To purchase sheep and improve the herd's condition

loans.name: Yoronimu

texts.en: Yoronimu is a 40 year old resident of Kagadi dealing in the transport business which he has operated for 2 years.He says he started by driving the neighbors’ taxi then he decided to buy it at a reduced price. His business is affected by the high fuel costs and taxes.He would like to work hard to ensure that his children are educated and would like to buy land for crop growing.Yoronimu wants a loan to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed, 30 years old married woman, she has two daughters and a son. Her husband has two jobs, one is with a governmental entity, the other is at home making sweets and sell.
Taghreed helps her husband preparing different type of sweet while he is at his work in daytime, so he can start selling after he gets home..
Now Taghreed has applied to this loan in order to buy new pots and some kitchen tools to increase the quantity of sweets they make so they can start distributing to the shops.

loans.use: to buy new pots and some kitchen tools

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en: Vanna, 29, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been work in garment factory for over two years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband runs public transportation service (motor taxi) and earns about USD 6 per day. Due to the present motorbike is too old, Vanna is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run the public transportation service (motor taxi). This purchase would enable her husband to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop, build a concrete house and help her children get bachelor’s degree

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run the public transportation service (motor taxi)

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en: Kennedy is 21 years old,he does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 9,000 Kenya Shillings to buy timber for making furniture.

loans.use: To buy timber for making furniture

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a 37 year old business man who deals in produce mainly maize, beans and groundnuts in Kagadi town. He is blessed with 11 children and has been in this business for a period of 5 years.He started by growing his own crops then sold and got capital and started buy from others.He faces a problem of price fluctuation and inflation which erodes most of the profits.He would like to educate his children and buy a car.George would like to diversify his business to a processing business.He therefore wants a loan to buy maize, beans and beans for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize, beans for sale.

loans.name: Batjantsan

texts.en:
Batjantsan is a-47-year-old married man who lives with his family in outer ger district lacks basic infrastructure of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.  He is a security man at local high school. 

Since last year, he has managed to build a new house and he wants to finish it this spring. Therefore he is requesting a 800.000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase some necessary construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 40 years old,married with 4 children. He does motorcycle transport business to earn a living,he has been in the business for 3 years and describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. To earn extra income he does masonry. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy  a motorbike

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en: Anthony is a 39 year old resident of Kagadi who has 8 children and operates a business dealing Cloth selling .He started by practicing agriculture got capital for the current business now operating for 8 years .Price fluctuations, high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He would like to educate his children and for the business he would like to expand it into new markets. Anthony wants a loan to buy more clothes during Easter season for sale.

loans.use: to buy more clothes during Easter season for sale.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is 34 years old,married with 2 children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living,he has been in the business for 3 years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. To earn extra income he does maize farming. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to grow his business and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar,rice,cooking oil and a maize flour for sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar,rice,cooking oil and maize flour for sell

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 28 year old resident of Kagadi who has 2 children and runs a business dealing shoe selling.He started by laying bricks then saved and got capital for the current business now for 3 years.Price fluctuations, high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He would like to build a permanent home and buy a car .His business dream is to expand it into new markets. Robert wants a loan to buy more shoes for sale.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Zamzam

texts.en:
Zamzam, 43 years old married woman, her husband works in a restaurant. They have six members to support in the family.
Zamzam has a small home business making embroidery dresses by order, she hopes that one day she can open an embroidery workshop and make large quantity of dress to distribute around the shops in the market.
Now she has applied to this loan to buy more colorful threads to complete her orders.

loans.use: to buy more colorful threads

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, 44, is a rice farmer who is hard-working in the business. She happily performs her daily tasks at the rice field with her family. She was born and grew up in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. Now she has been blessed with 6 single children, some of whom are students and still need her support. Rice is the primary sector of her family and another portion of profit is earned from trading red sugar palm juice managed by her husband.

San has been a client of HKL for a few years. She has already paid off her previous loans and this is her third loan that she will use it to purchase red sugar palm juice from local villagers and her frequent customers for trading. She hopes to have a good return from her investment.

loans.use: to purchase red sugar palm juice for trading.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 31 years old and married to Esther and they have seven children. He has been a poultry farmer for the past 5 years.

This is his first loan with KADET ltd .He was introduced by a Kadet client. He plans to use the loan amount to purchase more chicken for rearing.

His hopes and dreams are to become a known eggs supplier in the area.

loans.use: Purchase chicks

loans.name: Eng

texts.en: Eng, 52, is widower and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. He has been running public transportation service (motor taxi) for over nine years, earning approximately USD 8 per day. Four of his children are employed as garment workers and construction workers. Approximately, they earn USD 16 per day. Due to the present motorbike is old, Eng is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for running the business. This purchase would enable him to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living and help her children get bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for running the business

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi is a conservative young lady, she has asked her mother to take her place in the photo.
Hanadi is a 27 years old married lady, her husband works as in office boy at one of the Jordanian governmental entities, they have three children.
To help her husband in supporting the family, Hanadi started a small retail business at home selling blankets and home products as shown in the picture.
She has applied to this loan to bring in more types of home products to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to bring in more types of home products

loans.name: Magsar

texts.en:
Magsar is a 39-year-old carpenter who lives with his family in the outer ger district without the basic infrastructure of Ulaabaatar city, Mongolia. His spouse is a doctor for a local kindergarten, and their son and daughter both attend secondary school. 

His previously Kiva loan was setting up the heating system on his new house and he installed a heating system on his house. Now he repaid his loan and requesting a 500.000 MNT to recover his yard by block. 

He is also a very trusted client of Transcapital Co Ltd.

loans.use: to purchase blocks

loans.name: Honorine Sèdè's Group

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, Honorine Sèdè est la responsable d'un groupe de deux personnes. Elle a une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des mèches, des produits cosmétiques, des pagnes et autres articles. Elle s'approvisionne sur les marchés de la place. Pour étendre son activité et répondre aux préoccupations de sa clientèle, elle fait recours au financement de Finadev afin de maximiser son profit et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants. La responsable est celle qui se retouve à droite de la photo.
texts.en: Honorine Sèdè is married and the mother of four children.  She is the representative of a group made up of two people.  She has a shop in which she sells hair extensions, cosmetic products, some "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics) and other items.  She buys her goods at a local market.  In order to expand her business and to meet the needs of her customers, she is requesting a loan from Finadev.  This loan will allow her to maximize her profits and to contribute to her children's school fees.  Honorine Sèdè is the woman standing in the photograph on the right.

loans.use: to buy 20 cosmetic products and 10 "pagnes" of all kinds.

loans.name: Inas

texts.en:
Inas, 31 years old conservative lady, she asked her husband Yasser to take her place in the photo.
Inas and Yasser has one son. Yasser owns a restaurant and work at it.
Inas wanted to start her own business too, so she start selling home products, mainly kitchen ware and items. Now she has applied to this loan to increase the quantity she has in her inventory, in hopes that she can open her own home products showroom in the future.

loans.use: To add more home products to what she sells other than kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 47 year old gentle man married with 5 children and deals in a produce business which he has run for a period of 10 years. He started with agriculture harvested sold  and got capital to start buying from others.He says price fluctuation and inadequate capital is affecting the business.He would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets.Stephen wants a loan to buy maize and groundnuts for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and groundnuts for sale.

loans.name: Mowafaq

texts.en:
Mowafaq is a 50 -year-old married man, he is a father of three sons and three daughters.

For the past two years, Mowafaq has been driving a pickup car for transferring goods to customers from one place to another, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Mowafaq is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing his own pickup car. This will enable Mowafaq to has his own pickup car, which will allow him to transfer goods to customers freely with out any obligations to others, this will help Mowafaq to increase his work and improve the family's income to better.
Mowafaq is photographed next to the pickup car he will purchase.

loans.use: To complete purchasing a pickup car to use it for transferring goods

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam, 54 years old widowed. She dedicated herself to the business that she started it two years ago, which is a small grocery and food products store.
During these two years she was able to add every time a new item using the profit she makes, but now she has applied to this loan to enhance the store and buy a new refrigerator to prepare for the summer season and fill it with refreshing drinks.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator for her store.

loans.name: Husain

texts.en: Husain is a married man with 2 children and deals in  gifts business which he has run for a period of 3 years. He got capital from agriculture which he practiced for a period of 6 years.He says inadequate capital and customers not paying on time are affecting the business.Husain would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets.Husain wants a loan to buy gifts during Easter season for sale.

loans.use: to buy gifts during Easter season for sale.

loans.name: Benon

texts.en: Benon is a 33 year old gentle man married with 5 children and is a police officer by profession which he has practiced for a period of 12 years.  Benon would like to educate his children and build a permanent home. He wants a loan to buy building materials for completion of his house and buying a plot.

loans.use: to buy building materials for completion of his house and buying a plot.

loans.name: Maria Tereza

texts.en: Maria Tereza is a 47 year old lady dealing in local brew business. She says she has practiced it for 10 years which she started with capital got from baking powder.He faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time. Maria Tereza would like mostly to build a permanent home. She would like to move her business to more permanent location .She wants a loan to buy more local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy more local brew for sale.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is a 27 year old gentle man married with 2 children and is a teacher by profession which he has practiced for a period of 2 years. Daniel would like to educate his children, buy a car and build a permanent home. He wants a loan to buy bricks, sand and iron sheets for constructing a house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, iron sheets for constructing a house.

loans.name: Haitham

texts.en:
Haitham is a 28 -year-old young man, he is  employed in a local factory and earns a salary, but not enough to cover all the costs, he is engaged and prepares his house to get marry soon.

Hiatham is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of completing finishing his house and improving its's condition such as: installing tiles, installing windows and doors, painting.
Taking this loan will allow Haitham to prepare well his house and get marry soon to live in a suitable house's condition with his wife.
Haitham is photographed next to his house.

loans.use: To complete finishing the house

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra, 23 years old conservative married lady, she has asked her husband Rafat to take her place in the photo.
Yusra is a housewife who is taking care of her three daughters. Rafat is the one supporting the family, he has a scrape shop where he also sell spare parts. He wants to add a new section for repairing household equipment such as a refrigerators, washer, and others. 
Yusra wants to help her husband expand his business so she has applied to this loan to start his new section for repairing.

loans.use: to open a new section in the store for machinery repairing

loans.name: Israa

texts.en:
Israa, 22 years old conservative married lady, she asked her father in law to take her place in the photo.
Israa has two sons and a daughter, she is married to military man who comes home after his duty is over to start working in their small business which is selling gas pipes, unfortunately   they were not able to have a special store for selling those gas pipes, so they brought few and put it in a room for sell.
Now they want to expand, but for their safety and their children’s Israa has applied to a loan in order to have a store outside the house and increase the number of pipes they got so they can also distribute around their neighborhood.

loans.use: To open a store for selling gas pipes

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 27 -year-old young married man, he is a father of one daughter.

For the past ten years, Ahmad has been opening a workshop for repairing vehicles, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Ahmad wants to renew the repairing kit he has, so he is requesting a 2,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new repairing vehicles kit. This will improve the quality of work, especially that Ahmad's workshop has loyal customers and enjoys a good reputation among them, this will lead to increase the size of work and improve the family's income.

Ahmad is photographed in his workshop.

loans.use: To purchase necessary vehicle repairing kit

loans.name: Rehab

texts.en: Rehab is a 47 years old single woman, she has a small business to support herself which is knitting and embroidery, she has applied to this loan to increase her productivity and buy more threads and yarn to be able to open a shop for selling her handcrafts.

loans.use: to buy more yarn and threads

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam, 44 years old conservative lady, for that she has asked her husband to appear in the photo instead of her.
Ibtisam has four children to support with her husband, she has a small grocery store in a separated room that belongs to her house, her husband works in animal sales.
Ibtisam has applied to this loan to buy more food products for the store so she can expand later and open a mini-market in the neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy more food products for the store

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad is a conservative person who prefers not to have his photo published online, so his son appears in his Kiva profile photo.

Rashad is a 59 -year-old married man, he is a father of three sons and four daughters, he is a farmer works in cultivated olive trees and vegetables and resell the crop to customers.

For the past ten years, Rashad has also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Rashad is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing additional numbers of sheep in order to increase the profit. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To increase number of sheep he is raising

loans.name: Niveen

texts.en:
Niveen, 24 years old conservative lady. She has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.
Niveen is a housewife who is taking care of her three children, her husband has two jobs, one is a houses painter, the other managing his small grocery store. Niveen also helps in the grocery store by covering his place when he has a painting job to do.
Now Niveen has applied to this loan to improve on the store and add more food products that has been requested by their customers.

loans.use: add more food products

loans.name: Rahmeh

texts.en:
Rahmeh, a 46 years old married woman, she has eight sons and daughters, her husband started working in an animal sales business after his retirement from the military.
Rahmeh has her own small home business. she uses the milk she get from her husband’s sheep to make ordinary yogurt and Jordanian special yogurt called Jameed. Now she has applied to this lon to buy new machine that will make the productivity easier one her and faster, so she can start making cheese in the future.

loans.use: to buy new machine for making dairy products

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 23 -year-old young man, he is married with no children yet.
For the past five years, Ahmad has been opening a store for selling all types of shoes, which has been a profitable project, but also not enough to cover all costs.

Ahmad is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new collection of summer season shoes to resell upon customers requests. This will offer to Ahmad new collection of Summer shoes and enable him to compete with others well, this will lead to increase sales and improve his income.
Ahmad is photographed next to his store.

loans.use: To purchase new collection of  summer season shoes for sale

loans.name: Etta

texts.en: Etta live in Compound #3,50 years old,married and has 8 children between the ages of 14 and 33,they all live on their own and attending  college,for the past  twelve years she has been selling used clothes in the market,she started this business by the help of her mother, she is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business,her plans is to support her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 54 -year-old married man, he is a father with four sons and three daughters.

For the past two years, Mohammad has been opening a grocery store, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all costs.

Mohammad is requesting a 1,200 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a variety of products and groceries for sale such as: rice, milk, sugar, cook oil. 
This will enable Mohammad to offer to customers all types of groceries they often request and buy, which will  increase sales and improve the family's income.
Mohammad is having a picture inside his grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase more groceries for sale.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en: Margert is 40 years old,married and live in Compound #3 along with 4 children between 1 to 16 years old, three are in school and all of them live at home,   6 years now she has been selling rice and oil,she like the way costumers respond to her business and she learned this way of selling from her mother,Margert is requesting a loans to buy more rice and oil for her business,in future she want to send her children to higher education(college).

loans.use: to buy more rice and oil for her business

loans.name: Gülay's Group

texts.en:
Gülay is a 40-year old divorced woman having 2 children. Following an unsuccessful marriage, she had to take care of herself and the 2 little ones without any support from her family. After many unsuccessful attempts to land a job, gülay decides to start her own business.Gülay has started her venture with a very small budget. ınitially, she bought her goods from local wholesalers in Eskisehir since her operations were small and she did not have the resources to buy from other cities with lower prices. Gülay has sharpened her business skills in time and she believes that commitment and persistence are key to success. Gülay's numerous attempts to rent a space at the local market allowed her to expand her business and she even bought a vehicle and learned how to drive to transport her goods in between local markets. Gülay took care of her children with the income from her business. Gülay is a hard working, self-starter, and intelligent woman. Gülay uses the funds from maya to support the capital requirement of her business during low seasons. Gülay is thankful to Maya for the support and her friends from local markets also use the funds from Maya for their businesses.  This is her first loan through kiva.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Volunteers

Gülay ,1972 Eskişehir doğumlu.Zor bir evliliğin ardından hayatına tek başına devam etmek zorunda kalmış ve 2 çocuğu var.Eşiyle ayrıldıktan sonra çalışmak zorunda ve çocuklarına bakmak zorunda olan Gülay Hanım ailesine yük olmayı asla düşünmemiş.Kendi ayaklarının üzerinde durup çocukları için çalışmak zorundaymış çünkü.Yapabileceği bütün iş başvurularını yapmış nerdeyse fakat bir sonuç alamayınca neden kendi işimi kendim yapmıyorum deyip bunu en iyi ticaretle yapabileceğini düşünmüş.O kadar küçük bir rakamla başlamış ki ticarete şu an onun için bu başlangıç rakamı güzel bir anı.Önceleri sadece Eskişehir toptancılarından getirdiği pijama ve iç çamaşırlarını satmaya başlamış çünkü şehir dışına gidip mal almak onun için bir lüksmüş fakat kısa zamanda bu işin ustası olmayı başarmış.İnsan dört elle sarılırsa neler yapamaz diyen Gülay Hanım sonrasında bir semt pazarından yer alabilmek için günlerce uğraşmış ve sonunda onuda başarmış,tezgahlar bir iki derken şu an eskişehir çeşitli pazarlarında tezgahları var ve hatta bu iş için bir araç bile alıp onu kullanmayı öğrenmiş.Çocuklarını yaptığı işle büyüten Gülay Hanım evin hem annesi hem de babası.Çalışkan ,azimli,zeki bir kadın .halen yaptığı işte dönem dönem özellikle kış aylarında satışın azaldığı günlerde ve yazın mal getirmek için sermaya sıkıntısı çektiği dönemlerde maya sayesinde bu sıkıntısını gidererek işini devam ettiriyor.Kendisi gibi pazarcı arkadaşları ile kullandığı maya kredisi için Maya’ya teşekkür ettiğinide özellikle dile getiriyor.

loans.use: to buy more product

loans.name: Fadel

texts.en:
Fadel has a picture inside his store.

Fadel is a 36 -year-old married young man, he is a father with one son and two daughters.

For the past two years, Fadel has been opening a store for home products sales, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Fadel is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing bulk of home products that customers usually buy to be used in their different occasions especially in Summer season. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase collection of home products for sale

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 26 years old single mother of three children. She is a charcoal seller and has been in the business for the past four years.

This is her first loan with Kadet ltd .She was introduced by a Kadet client. She plans to use the loan to purchase 30 sacks of charcoal to increase her stocks.

Her hopes and dreams are to be a known supplier of charcoal in her area.

loans.use: Purchases stock

loans.name: Fègnon Odette

texts.fr: Agée de 56 ans, Fègnon Odette est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la vente des pagnes, pommades, mèches et autres articles. Elle a sa boutique sise à son domicile. Soucieuse d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire afin de satisfaire ses clients, elle bénéficie d'un concours à Finadev. Le revenu supplémentaire dégagé par l'activité lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Fègnon Odette is 56 years old, married, and mother of two children.

She specializes in the sale of loincloths, ointments, hair extentions, and other items. Her shop is located in her home.

Striving to increase her sales in order to satisfy her customers, she is receiving assistance from Finadey. The extra revenue from her business will allow her to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy 10 loincloths, 20 cosmetic products, 20 hair extentions, and she will use the rest to buy other items

loans.name: Qussai

texts.en:
Qussai is photographed in the herd, next to the sheep he is raising.

Qussai is a 27 -year-old young single man, his mother is a school employee who gets low salary, which is not enough to cover all the costs.

For the past one year, Qussai has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project and a way to share with his mother the family's costs and needs.

Qussai is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and expanding and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income positively.

loans.use: To purchase more sheep and expand and improve the herd's condition

loans.name: Nyankiir

texts.en:
Nyankiir lives in Bor. She sells food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Nyankiir heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, oil. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans,oil for sale.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 34 years old, married to Samuel and they have three children. She is a timber dealer and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is her first loan with Kadet.She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase stock of timber for resale.

She hopes to own a plot of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 28 year old gentle man married with 1 child and is a teacher by profession which he has practiced for a period of 7 years. Patrick would like to educate his children, buy a car and build a permanent home. He wants a loan to buy bricks, sand, iron sheets for constructing a toilet.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, iron sheets for constructing a toilet.

loans.name: Talent Group

texts.fr:
Mme AMINA  est la représentante du groupe TALENT. Elle est mariée  et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 36ans et le moins âgé a 03ans.  02  vont à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle vend des pagnes et draps de lit depuis  08ans. Elle s’approvisionne  à LOME au TOGO. Ses clients sont  les  femmes et hommes.
Elle veut  s’acheter  50 pièces de pagne.

Elle utilise  ses bénéfices pour la scolarité de ses enfants à école supérieure. Elle ambitionne aider son mari pour l’électrification de leur maison.
texts.en:
Amina is the representative of the TALENT group.  She is married and the mother of three children.  Her oldest child is 36 years old, the youngest is 3.  Two of her children attend school.  She is financially responsible for three people.

Amina has been selling pagnes (colorful West-African fabrics) and bed sheets for 8 years.  She buys her merchandise in Lomé, Togo.  Her clients are men and women.  She would like to buy 50 sets of pagnes.

Amina uses her profits to pay for her children's higher education fees.  Her goal is to be able to help her husband install electricity inside their house.

loans.use: to buy 50 pagnes (colorful West-African fabrics)

loans.name: Tala

texts.en:
Tala lives in Bor. She sells food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 35year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Tala heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, oil. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans,oil for sale.

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is photographed inside one of the stores that sells home appliances. 

Nidal is a 29 -year-old young man, he is employed and earns low salary, which is not enough to cover all the costs.

Nidal is engaged and prepare himself to get marry soon, so he is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary home appliances such as: stove, washing machine, refrigerator. Taking this loan will enable Nidal to prepare well for this occasion and offer to his house suitable and necessary home appliances.

loans.use: To purchase home appliances preparing to get marry soon

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a forty six year old, however he changed business to produce in which he started with a capital of 300,000 shillings and  is now worth 1,200,000 shillings. His hardships are price fluctuation, high transport costs and inadequate capital to purchase stock.His personal goal is to educate children and business goals are to diversify business and expanding business to new markets.He needs the loan to buy beans and cassava flour for sell.

loans.use: to buy beans and cassava flour for sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 38 year old man with 7 children dealing in local brew business which he has operated for a period of 4 years. He got start up capital from brewing with his own bananas from his plantation then got capital.He faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time. Joseph would like mostly build a permanent home and educate his children. He would also like to move his business to more permanent location and expand it to other new markets.He therefore wants a loan to buy more local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy more local brew for sale.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 28 years old and single. She operates a green grocery and has been in the business for the past two years.

This is her first loan with Kadet of kes 13,000.She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase more vegetables for stock in her business.

Her hopes and dreams are to own a permanent business premises.

loans.use: Purshase stock

loans.name: Tugumisirize Saaco Group

texts.en: Josephine is a 42 year old woman married with 6 children and deals in a retail business which she has run for a period of 4 year.She is a member of Tugumisirize SACCO a village bank where group guarantor ship is security for a loan. She started with selling her goat which she was rearing got capital and started a retail shop. She says price fluctuation is affecting the business. Josephine would like to educate her children and move her business to more permanent location.She wants a loan to buy sugar, salt and baking powder for sale.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and baking powder for sale.

loans.name: Johnan

texts.en: Johnan is a 32 year old gentle man married with 1 child and deals in a produce business which he has run for a period of 3 years. He started with agriculture harvested maize which he sold and got capital and started buying from others. He says price fluctuation; inadequate capital is affecting the business. Johnan would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. He wants a loan to buy maize and groundnuts for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and groundnuts for sale.

loans.name: Shukri

texts.en:
Shukri is photographed inside one of the stores that sells home appliances. 
Shukri is a 24 -year-old young man, he is employed and earns low salary, which is not enough to cover all the costs for his wedding preparations. Shukri is engaged and prepare himself to get marry soon, so he is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary home appliances such as: stove, washing machine, refrigerator. Taking this loan will enable Shukri to prepare well for his wedding and offer to his house suitable and necessary home appliances.

loans.use: To purchase necessary home appliances to prepare his house for wedding

loans.name: Yar

texts.en:
Yar lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Yar heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Mbene

texts.en: Mbene is a thirty year old married man with two children living in Kasese,Uganda and practicing agriculture.His hardship is unpredictable seasonal weather variations and his personal goals are building a permanent house and educating children. He has a business goal of starting other income generating activities .He intends to use the loan facility to iron sheets for constructing his residential house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets

loans.name: Athau

texts.en:
Athau lives in Bor. She sells food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Athau heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar for sale.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 25 year old business man who deals in produce mainly maize and beans in Kagadi town. He is has  3 children and has been in this business for a period of 2 years .He started by growing his own crops then sold and got capital to start buying from others. Robert faces a problem of price fluctuation and inflation which erodes most of the profits . His personal dreams are to educate his children and buy a car and his business dream is to expand his business into new markets.Robert wants a loan to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Obed

texts.en: Obed is a 28 year old gentle man married with 4 children and has a retail shop which he has run for a period of 2 years. He got capital from savings of his salary as a civil servant and started a retail shop. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business.Obed would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. He wants a loan to buy sugar, salt and plastics for sale.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and plastics for sale.

loans.name: Kasifa

texts.en: Kasifa used the previous loan to buy rice and sugar for sell.The 38-year-old married woman, has  four children and lives in Kasese, Uganda. Kasifa has operated a retail shop for six years. Her hardships are still inadequate capital to purchase stock, inflation and price fluctuations. Her personal goal is to educate her children and her business goal is to diversify her business. Kasifa is requesting a loan to buy rice and sugar to sell in her shop.

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar to sell

loans.name: Awuol

texts.en:
Awuol lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Awuol heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Luz Maryori

texts.es:
Luz Maryori ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y seguir luchando para progresar. Hace unos años salió del país en busca de mejores oportunidades económicas, pero debido a las crisis que se presentaron en los últimos años en los países europeos se vio en la obligación de regresar a su país y comenzar nuevamente en la búsqueda de su progreso económico. Fue así como comenzó su negocio de venta de insumos para la confección donde ofrece los insumos básicos como hilos, agujas, entre otros. Con este negocio, el cual fue abierto hace muy poco tiempo, puede generar los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y poder contribuir para que su madre tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, Luz Maryori busca que un préstamo le permita comprar surtido de insumos como agujas, hilos, entre otros para su negocio y así poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.

De esta manera su negocio será más atractivo para los clientes y así aumentará sus ventas considerablemente. Además, podrá seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y su familia tendrá acceso a mejores oportunidades económicas.

loans.use: Comprar surtido de insumos como agujas, hilos, entre otros para su negocio y así poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.

loans.name: Ayen

texts.en:
Ayen lives in Bor. She sells food stall, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Ayen heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans, sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar for sale.

loans.name: Luz Andrea

texts.es:
Luz Andrea es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos de 1 y 4 años de edad, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica. Anteriormente trabajaba como operaria en una empresa de confecciones, pero al sentir que su trabajo era muy mal remunerado, decidió montar su propio taller de confección desde su casa con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Fue así como montó desde su casa un taller de confección en el cual ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros y donde al mismo tiempo puede estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, y es por esto que actualmente su capacidad de producción es inferior a los pedidos que hacen sus clientes de sus servicios. Es por esto que Luz Andrea busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina industrial para la confección en su taller y así aumentar la capacidad de producción para poder responder a todos los pedidos que hacen sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá tener mayores ventas y por ende mayores ingresos, y con los cuales podrá ofrecer a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una buena educación. Luz Andrea sueña con tener un gran taller donde pueda generar empleo para los más necesitados y desde el cual pueda ofrecer una estabilidad económica a sus hijos.

loans.use: Compra de una máquina industrial para la confección en su taller y así aumentar la capacidad de producción para poder responder a todos los pedidos que hacen sus clientes.

loans.name: Athieng

texts.en:
Athieng lives in Bor. She sells charcoal, and has been in business for three years. She is 28 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Anthieng heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 32 years married to Wilfred, and they have one child. She sells charcoal and has been in the business for the past three years.

This is her first loan with Kadet.She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase more stock of charcoal for resale in her business.

Her hopes and dreams are to open a large retail shop in the near future.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: Sandra Virginia

texts.es: Sandra con su anterior credikiva, compró materias prima e insumos al por mayor, 2 lavadoras y mercancía con la cual fortaleció su negocio de venta de mercancía mediante guías especializadas de productos. Ella ganó porque encontró buenos descuentos y vendió rápidamente a su clientela. Hoy está aplicando a un credikiva con el cual aprovechará para comprar artículos de la oferta, que ya solicitó en su catalogo y venderá a un buen precio a su mejor clientela. Así mismo, provisionará de materias primas, el negocio de comidas rápidas y hará mantenimiento a todas sus lavadoras. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: “Estoy muy agradecida con a Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con todos los que me apoyan, por ayudar a personas como nosotros que no tenemos quien nos apruebe un crédito bajo las condiciones existentes”.

loans.use: comprar artículos de la oferta, que ya solicitó en su catalogo y venderá a un buen precio a su mejor clientela. Así mismo, provisionará de materias primas, el negocio de comidas rápidas y hará mantenimiento a todas sus lavadoras

loans.name: Zunilda Maria

texts.es: Zunilda vive al sur Occidente  de la ciudad con su cónyuge y tienen 4 hijos en las edades de 3 a 14 años; allí mismo  tiene un negocio donde vende comidas rápidas, que funciona los fines de semana. Este negocio lo inició desde hace 4 años, vendiendo perros calientes y hamburguesas  con una mesa 1 horno, y $300.000 COP. Los cuales ubicó en la terraza de su casa, aprovechando que   por allí transitan moradores del sector, que se dirigen a sus hogares. Su sueño es tener una segunda planta, para separar su vida familiar de la empresarial, adecuando su negocio con toda la infraestructura, que le permita a sus clientes, disfrutar de un ambiente confortable y a ella condiciones productivas optimas, donde desarrollar efectivamente su actividad y comprar materias primas. Su poco espacio se convierte en un desafió, así como su insuficiente capital de trabajo, para hacer adecuaciones pertinentes. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materiales para construcción, con el fin de adecuar los pisos de la terraza donde funciona su negocio. Con esta inversión logrará empezar a cumplir su propósito y sus clientes estarán mas satisfechos con un sitio elegante donde tomar sus alimentos.

loans.use: comprar materiales de cosntrucción, para hacer adecuaciones locativas y comprar materias primas

loans.name: Nelis Estela

texts.es:
Nelis, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, porque se acerca el tiempo de preparar la tierra para los cultivos, ella comprara nuevamente los insumos como el abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, para aplicarlos y poder tener un proceso adecuado de siembra.
El préstamo anterior le permitió realizar un buen cultivo, obteniendo una cosecha abundante,  con lo que pudo pagar el préstamo, sus condiciones han sido más solventes frente a las obligaciones del hogar.

loans.use: Compra de abono, insecticidas y pesticidas.

loans.name: Luz Aide

texts.es:
Luz Aide es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar han hecho que salga adelante y supere todas sus dificultades. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de su única hija de 5 años, es la encargada de todas las necesidades en su hogar, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo dejándola a cargo de su hogar y de su hija. Con mucha fortaleza Luz Aide ha venido trabajando para poder ofrecer a su hija una buena calidad de vida, y desde su taller de confección ha logrado aumentar sus ventas y poder generar mayores ingresos. Gracias a que ha venido trabajando fuertemente, ha logrado aumentar la calidad de sus productos y de la misma manera ha logrado aumentar sus clientes; es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina devastadora con la cual pueda ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes y así seguir aumentando sus ventas.

De esta manera su hija podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida gracias al aumento en sus ingresos, además de que podrá seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de poder sacar su hija adelante.

loans.use: Comprar una máquina devastadora con la cual pueda ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes y así seguir aumentando sus ventas.

loans.name: Adut

texts.en:
Adut lives in Bor. She sells charcoal, and has been in business for five years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; three of them are still in school. 

Adut heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, se ha decidió por un nuevo préstamo, para seguir fortaleciendo la panadería comprara harina, huevos, azúcar, jaleas, levadura, que le permitirán elaborar una mayor producción de pan, su objetivo es crecer y espera lograrlo a través del aporte de estos préstamos.
El efecto que tuvo con su préstamo anterior fue positivo, aumentando la producción con los materiales que compro, cambiando sus ingresos y las condiciones para su familia, ahora tiene una mejor condición.

loans.use: Compra de harina, huevos, azúcar, jaleas, levadura.

loans.name: Ada Cristela

texts.es:
Ada, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para invertirlo en el negocio, pues comprara 4 cerdos más, con la intensión de crecer en su granja, pues entre mas disponga de cerdos, será mejor la disponibilidad para ofrecer a los clientes.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo en su granja, ya que las compras le han dado la oportunidad de tener para la venta, sus ingresos han mejorado, esta junto a su familia prosperando en el comercio de los cerdos.

loans.use: Compra de 4 cerdos.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 28 years old and single. She has been selling second hand clothes business for the past 11 years.

This is her first loan with Kadet ltd of kes 30,000.She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan funds to purchase stock of clothes for resale.

Her hope is to operate her business in a permanent premise.

loans.use: Purchase stock of second hand clothes

loans.name: Yesenia Beatriz

texts.es:
Yesenia, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para ampliar el negocio, comprándose frutas frescas como papayas, sandias, piñas, jocotes, melón, pues quiere mantener una variedad de frutas para aprovechar a vender más.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le sirvió mucho, pues logro salir con sus ventas y tener dinero para las necesidades del hogar, así como para pagar el préstamo.

loans.use: Compra de papayas, sandias, piñas, jocotes, melón.

loans.name: Ayen

texts.en:
Ayen lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 32 year old, married, and has four children; two of them are still in school. 

Ayen heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Cesar Tulio

texts.es: César de 45 años vive en el sur occidente de la ciudad con su esposa, de oficio confeccionista,  y sus  3 hijos en las edades de 8 a 15 años. Oriundo de Palmito, población del departamento de Sucre, llegó a la ciudad de Barranquilla, donde vive hace 22 años y hace 10 se dedicó a la venta de comidas rápidas, pues anteriormente se dedicaba a la albañilería.  Él aprovecha muy bien su clientela usual, porque allí mismo, vende minutos a celulares y esto le oxigena los dos negocios, ubicados en su propia casa. Su meta mas adelante es ampliarlos, adecuando sus instalaciones locativas. Así mismo sueña con ver convertidos a sus hijos en profesionales exitosos y esto lo mueve día a día.   En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará comidas rápidas, butifarras, chorizo, etc., pues requiere aumentar su oferta productiva, en tanto su clientela ha aumentado y cada día exige mucha variedad y esta son justamente las razones por las cuales acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará sus materias primas y será exitosa su inversión, porque lo hará fundamentado en su experiencia  y en la demanda actual de su mercado.

loans.use: comprará sus materias primas para la preparación de comidas rápidas

loans.name: Fanis Maritza

texts.es:
Fany, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para iniciar la nueva siembra, pues comprara abono, semilla, que es lo necesario para que su cultivo de pipián pueda dar inicio.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar la calidad de la cosecha, aumentando la producción, con esto Fany ha podido mejorar los ingresos para su familia.

loans.use: Compra de abono y semilla.

loans.name: Juliana Andrea

texts.es:
Juliana es una joven emprendedora que desde muy corta edad viene trabajando junto con su abuelo en el negocio del transporte de mercancía. Gracias a esto, desde muy temprana edad aprendió a conducir, y debido a la avanzada edad de su abuelo, desde los 16 años Juliana viene estando a cargo del negocio. En un principio fue muy difícil poder adaptarse al trabajo, pues las personas veían con muy malos ojos que una mujer condujera un camión y además de esto que sea tan joven, sin embargo, con mucho esfuerzo Juliana ha logrado superar estas adversidades y lograr continuar con su trabajo. Actualmente Juliana tiene 22 años y ha manifestado que su negocio le ha permitido poder culminar sus estudios y poder ofrecer en su hogar una contribución económica que permite que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su camión ya tiene mucho tiempo sin hacerle algún mantenimiento, Juliana busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de nueva cojinería para el vehículo y pintarlo para poder hacerle un mantenimiento y darle un mejor aspecto.

De esta manera su negocio podrá ser más atractivo para sus clientes y poder seguir aumentando sus ventas. Juliana sueña con tener un gran negocio y con poder tener una fuente de ingresos con la cual pueda progresar económicamente y con la cual su familia también pueda acceder a una mejor calidad de vida.

loans.use: Compra de nueva cojinería para el vehículo y pintarlo para poder hacerle un mantenimiento y darle un mejor aspecto.

loans.name: Juan Crisostómo

texts.es: Juan con su credikiva anterior compró materias primas, con las que elaboró bolsos femeninos, sandalias y las vendió a un buen precio. Está muy satisfecho porque además recibió un subsidio de vivienda en el macro proyecto Villas de San Pablo, apoyado por la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo en su programa  “Sueños y oportunidades”.  En la actualidad Juan está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el que comprará mercancías para surtir su tienda, pues abrió un nuevo negocio, ubicándolo en una esquina muy comercial , donde vende  artículos de la canasta familiar a las familias cercanas, lo cual generará nuevos ingresos para su hogar.  Ambos son negocios muy rentables y él los conoce muy bien. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Agradecimientos por la confianza en mi negocio” y pide que lo sigan apoyando para ampliar su tienda y cumplir sus sueños de mejoramiento de su bienestar y el de su familia.

loans.use: comprará mercancías para surtir su tienda

loans.name: Gup

texts.en:
Gup lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has four children; two of them are still in school. 

Gup heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, pues quiere comprarse más mercadería (licores), ya que esto le ayudara para tener más capacidad para atender a los clientes.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo con respecto al negocio, porque logro realizar la inversión, en su caso particular, tuvo algunos inconvenientes de salud, pero que están siendo superados.

loans.use: Compra de licores.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, porque sus deseos de seguir superándose la motivan, para realizar una nueva inversión en la compra de perfumería, este préstamo le ayudara para tener nuevos perfumes que sean del agrado de los clientes.
El efecto que tuvo el préstamo anterior en el negocio, fue positivo, pues sus ventas aumentaron, así logro tener más ingresos para sus necesidades familiares.

loans.use: Compra de perfumes.

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es: Mauricio es un hombre de 44 años, que vive al sur de la ciudad con su esposa y su hijo de 13 años; allí se dedica al comercio de autopartes de toda clase, su ubicación en un sitio muy cercano a talleres automotriz, hace que fluyan sus ventas día a día. De esta manera su capital de trabajo se convierte en su principal desafío para tener surtido su negocio. Su meta mas adelante, es tener puntos comerciales o almacenes en varios sectores de la ciudad, para abordar gran parte del mercado que no es atendido. Mauricio está aplicando a su primer credikiva, porque invertirá en accesorios y repuestos de vehículos, rines suspensiones etc,, pues aprovechará las oportunidades de comprar en mayor volumen, para poner en marcha sus habilidades de comerciante, aprendidas desde antes de emprender su negocio, cuando era el agente vendedor de una empresa que manejaba la misma línea de productos,  que hoy él  tiene, en su propio negocio.

loans.use: invertirá en accesorios y repuestos de vehículos, rines suspensiones etc.

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
Jose se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, es por esto que siempre trabaja fuertemente para poder brindar en su hogar todo lo necesario. Anteriormente Jose trabajaba vendiendo frutas y verduras en la plaza de mercado de su municipio, y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos su negocio llegó a crecer y a ser reconocido en el sector; sin embargo, por circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de cerrar su negocio y fue así como entonces abrió una tienda general desde su casa con la cual pudiera seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Jose abrió su tienda hace aproximadamente 2 años y hasta el momento ha logrado consolidarla en el sector y lograr atraer muy buenos clientes, sin embargo, debido a que su tienda fue montada con muy bajo capital, a veces encuentra dificultades para poder surtir su negocio. Es por esto que Jose busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para poder surtir su tienda y ofrecer así una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio podrá ser más atractivo para sus clientes y así sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente. Además, con mayores ingresos su esposa y sus 2 hijos podrán acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.

loans.use: Compra de productos de la canasta familiar para poder surtir su tienda y ofrecer así una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

loans.name: Yamila Jeanneth

texts.es:
Yamila, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para mejorar la tienda que ha instalado, ella comprara más mercadería como boquitas, gaseosas, pastas, harina, condimentos, pues su aspiración es variar los productos y mantener de aquellos que sus clientes necesiten más.
El préstamo anterior le dio a Yamila, una mayor seguridad para atender los trabajos de sastreria a la clientela, pues obtuvo los materiales necesarios para confeccion, dándole mejores ganancias.

loans.use: Compra de boquitas, gaseosas, pastas, harina, condimentos.

loans.name: Ajong

texts.en:
Ajong lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 32 year old, married, and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Ajong heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Esmeralda Guadalupe

texts.es:
Esmeralda, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para seguir trabajando en su negocio, comprara pollos de engorde y concentrado, para crecer en la granja y multiplicar sus ganancias. 
Ella tuvo una experiencia positiva de los préstamos anteriores, aumentando las ventas en el negocio, esto le ha permitido que su familia cuente con mejores ingresos todo debido al buen manejo del dinero del préstamo.

loans.use: Compra de pollos de engorde y concentrado.

loans.name: Horison Manuel

texts.es: Horison de 47 años  vive en la ciudad de Cartagena con su esposa y sus dos hijos en las edades de 20 y 22 años. Él se dedica a la venta de pescados y mariscos en general, negocio que inició desde hace 18 años,  ante la necesidad de mejorara los ingresos familiares y bridarle un mayor bienestar a sus hijos. Inicio con venta ambulante de filete de robalo, salmón y corvina, por las calles de Cartagena, la ciudad heroica de Colombia, llegando así a cubrir las necesidades de consumos de muchas familias de esa ciudad. Hoy su número de barrios ha incrementado y ha incluido en su oferta otros productos del mar como camarón, cazuela de mariscos, chipichipi, ostras etc. Con su negocio le ha ido muy bien porque es reconocida la calidad y frescura de sus productos, además de su actitud alegre para vender.  Su meta es comprar en mayores cantidades, pero su mayor desafío es que su capital de trabajo resulta insuficiente para responder a sus planes apoyados en su demanda. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará pescados y mariscos en mayor volumen; su inversión será exitosa porque la fundamenta en muchos pedidos solicitados por sus clientes, a propósito de la semana mayor, donde baja el consumo de carnes, para dar paso al consumo de productos del mar y para cumplir con una parte de la tradición de abstinencia, como lo hacen  gran parte de los clientes, a los que Horison les vende..

loans.use: comprará pescados y mariscos en mayor volumen

loans.name: Achol

texts.en:
Achol lives in Bor. She sells charcoal, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Achol heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
Jesus es una persona que gracias a sus ganas de trabajar ha logrado sacar su propio negocio adelante y consolidarlo entre sus clientes. Hace aproximadamente 3 años montó su negocio de fabricación de arepas rellenas de queso y este ha crecido en los últimos años de una manera considerable, hasta el punto que ahora puede generar un empleo para una persona muy necesitada y su familia también puede gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Jesus se encuentra separado y con el convive su único hijo, por lo que se esfuerza diariamente para poder tener en su hogar y brindarle a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, además de poder asegurarle un futuro económico estable y una educación universitaria. En su negocio ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes, los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos constantemente, y es por esto que Jesus busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la fabricación de sus arepas como maíz, queso, harina, entre otros, y poder así preparar los grandes pedidos que han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y sus ingresos lo harán de la misma manera, pudiendo tener en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.

loans.use: Compra de insumos para la fabricación de sus arepas como maíz, queso, harina, entre otros, y poder así preparar los grandes pedidos que han hecho sus clientes.

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en:
Duncan is 39 years old, married to Anita and they have four children. He is a scrap metal dealer and has been in the business for the past two years.

This is his first loan with Kadet ltd. He was introduced by a Kadet client. He will use the loan amount to purchase more scrap metal for stock in his business.

His hopes are to venture into rental houses business.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es: José recibió anteriormente su credikiva con el cual compró panes, frutas legumbres y verduras en una buena proporción y las vendió rápidamente. Hoy quiere invertir nuevamente en panes, tambien incursionará  en el comercio de artesanías como hamacas, bolsos, sandalias, adornos, y accesorios femeninos; él tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes  y está fortaleciendo este mercado. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Gracias a su apoyo, mi negocio ha crecido, me ha generado ingresos, con los cuales he mejorado de gran manera mi casa. Los bendigo, en el nombre de Dios y los felicito por su buena labor humanitaria”.

loans.use: artesanías como hamacas, bolsos, sandalias, adornos, y accesorios femeninos,

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Bor. She sells charcoal, and has been in business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has five children; two of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer this is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Eugenio De Jesus

texts.es:
Eugenio, quiere seguir cultivando, para solicita un préstamo que le ayude a realizar la compra de los insumos como el abono, herbicidas y preparación del terreno, pues su trabajo continuo en la tierra es el que le permite mantener a su familia.
Él manifiesta que su experiencia con el préstamo anterior fue positiva, ya que obtuvo una buena cosecha, para la alimentación de la familia y cancelo su préstamo sin ningún inconveniente e instalo la energía en la vivienda. De esta misma manera espera trabajar este nuevo financiamiento.

loans.use: Compra de abono, herbicidas y preparación del terreno.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David, quiere seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, pues tiene trabajos pendientes de realizar, comprara hierro, alambre, lámina, para realizar su trabajo en las soldaduras, este financiamiento le ayudara a David, para tener lo necesario y seguir trabajando con calidad.
El efecto que tuvo con su préstamo anterior fue positivo, compro una pulidora, materiales para realizar el trabajo, con esto quedo bien ante sus clientes. En su familia se mantienen todos con buena salud y sus beneficios son mejores.

loans.use: Compra de hierro, alambre, lámina.

loans.name: Fanny Magdalena

texts.es:
Fanny se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 12 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder garantizar una buena calidad de vida en su hogar, Fanny desea contribuir económicamente en su hogar montando su propio negocio. Fanny tiene experiencia de aproximadamente 6 años en las actividades de la agricultura, pues durante mucho tiempo viene colaborando a su esposo en estas actividades, y gracias a esta experiencia desea iniciar su propio negocio de cría y venta de ganado para generar ingresos adicionales que sean suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Fanny busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de teneros de levante para así poder iniciar su propio negocio.

De esta manera Fanny podrá ofrecer en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y a sus hijos les brindará la posibilidad de acceder a una mejor educación. Además, sueña con poder tener un futuro económico estable y mayores oportunidades de progreso para su familia.

loans.use: Compra de teneros de levante para así poder iniciar su propio negocio.

loans.name: Marta Lorena

texts.es:
Marta, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, para darle continuidad al negocio de los mariscos y quiere invertir en frutas, comprara pescado fresco, conchas, mandarinas, naranjas, mangos, bananos, esto con la esperanza de tener demanda de los clientes para sacarle ganancia al préstamo.
Ella manifiesta que la inversión anterior le dio un efecto positivo, ya que agrego otro rubro más al negocio con las frutas, el buen manejo del préstamo y de la inversión, le han dado a la familia de Marta de gozar de mejoras en sus ingresos.

loans.use: Compra de pescado fresco, conchas, mandarinas, naranjas, mangos, bananos.

loans.name: Rev Charity

texts.en:
Charity is 56 years old  and single.She has six children.She is a poultry farmer and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is her first term loan in Kadet.She was introduced to Kadet by a Kadet client.She will use the loan to purchase more chicken for resale in her business.

She hopes to own a green house and plant vegetables in the near future.

loans.use: Purchase chicken

loans.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es:
Juan, está animado por seguir trabajando, pues su familia depende mucho de él, por esta razón solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de cremas, y artículos eléctricos, tambien zapatos, sandalias, cepillos, y más para poder surtir el negocio y disponer de mucha mercadería.
El considera que a través del préstamo anterior ha logrado mantenerse, pues realizo una buena inversión, dándole una mejor capacidad y solvencia económica con las necesidades de su familia.

loans.use: Compra de cremas, y artículos eléctricos, tambien zapatos, sandalias, cepillos.

loans.name: Blanca Elida

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona muy trabajadora que ha luchado fuertemente en su vida con el ánimo de sacar su familia adelante. Casada y con 4 hijos, siempre ha buscado una manera de poder ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, es por esto que al ver que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar ingresos adicionales para su familia. Gracias a que una amiga le enseñó la actividad, hace 3 años viene ofreciendo a sus clientes productos de uso personal, y con este negocio ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes y así mismo unas muy buenas ventas. Gracias sus buenos productos ha logrado tener muy buenos pedidos, y ahora busca poder ofrecer sus productos desde su casa y poderlos exhibir de una buena manera, es por esto que Blanca busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una vitrina, productos de uso personal para poderla surtir y así ofrecer sus productos desde su casa y con una buena exhibición.

De esta manera podrá hacer más atractivo su negocio para los clientes, pues podrá estar más visible para las personas del sector que aún no conocen su negocio, generando mayores ingresos y por ende ofreciendo a su esposo y sus 4 hijos una mejor calidad de vida.

loans.use: Compra de una vitrina, productos de uso personal para poderla surtir y así ofrecer sus productos desde su casa y con una buena exhibición.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin, quiere seguir invirtiendo en el negocio de la sastrería, comprara telas, hilos, boches, botones, con esto estará en mejor condición para continuar fabricando las prendas de vestir de su familia.
Su efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior le ha dado mejoras en sus ingresos, la construcción de un muro en su vivienda, y que sus clientes estén satisfechos con su trabajo realizado, tambien a adquirido una máquina de coser nueva, para mejorar y agilizar el trabajo.

loans.use: Compra de telas, hilos, boches, botones.

loans.name: Alive

texts.en:
Alice is 56 years old single mother of five. She sells utensils and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is her first loan with Kadet ltd of kes 30,000.She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase stocks of utensils for resale in her business.

Her hopes are to expand her business to a wholesale store.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: Carlota

texts.es:
Carlota, solicita un nuevo préstamo, para la compra de materia prima, además considera que estos préstamos son un medio de mucha ayuda para prosperar en el negocio y aportar a sus hijos para la educación. Ella comprara leña, barro, nacazcol y pago de transporte, además quiere construirse un rancho para proteger el horno donde cocina la loza.
El efecto del préstamo anterior fue positivo, ayudándole a obtener lo necesario para la elaboración de loza, su nucleó familiar se mantiene, su negocio se encuentra estable, tiene a sus dos hijos estudiando.

loans.use: Comprara leña, barro, nacazcol y pago de transporte.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro, necesita comprar más mercadería para el negocio, por eso solicita este préstamo para poder realizar la inversión en zapatos de vestir y deportivos para ambos sexos, con esto lograra mantenerse competente en el mercado.
Él considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para comprarse mercadería y mantener lo necesario para la venta.

loans.use: Compra de zapatos de vestir y deportivos.

loans.name: El Mana Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal El Mana está conformado por ocho emprendedoras que se han unido para forma este grupo y apoyarse unas a otras, se brinda ideas nuevas para sus negocios y salir adelante con cada uno de sus negocios. Este grupo de emprendedoras tienen objetivos bien definido que es de engrandecer su negocio teniendo siempre productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Es la primera vez que este grupo está solicitando financiamiento, la emprendedora  Ilda Victoria es parte de este grupo su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a una pulpería que la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación donde atiende a sus clientes con el crédito comprara granos básicos, aceite, jabón, pan, pasta de diente, cepillos de dientes, detergente entre otros productos que más demandan sus clientes.

loans.use: comprar granos básicos, aceite, jabón, pan, pasta de diente, cepillos de dientes, detergente entre otros productos que más demandan sus clientes.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer muy trabajadora y empeñosa que está logrando salir adelante poco a poco. Ella se convirtió en microempresaria en el instante en que empezó a vender ropa como recorredora, actividad a la que viene dedicándose unos cuantos años, fue gracias a su trabajo en un fundo, que ha logrado juntar poco a poco los ahorros necesarios para la compra de sus productos.

María desea que su negocio salga adelante y poco a poco pueda empezar a construir la pequeña boutique que ha anhelado desde hace mucho tiempo, ella sabe que si llega a lograrlo podrá tener un ingreso seguro y ya no tendrá que caminar diariamente bajo el inmenso sol que acompaña a la ciudad de Ica, Perú y a todos sus habitantes.

Con un poco de ayuda, Maria podrá comprar mucha más ropa (Polos, Shorts, Pantalones, etc.), ya que no solo se le están acabando los que actualmente vende, sino que también podrá compra la ropa de otoño que necesita para sus clientes. Con este apoyo, maría se sienta capaz de lograr el éxito y así mejorar mucho más su calidad de vida, para que en el algún momento logre lo que tanto ha deseado, “Su propia Boutique”.

loans.use: Para la compra de ropa (Polos, shorts, pantalones, etc.)
